lead_paragraph: In this film, a prison inmate must fabricate a Monet as part of a shadowy deal to get out of prison early.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘The Forger’ Stars John Travolta as a Convict and Painter
headline.main: Review: ‘The Forger’ Stars John Travolta as a Convict and Painter

snippet: In this film, a prison inmate must fabricate a Monet as part of a shadowy deal to get out of prison early.
abstract: A O Scott reviews film The Forger, directed by Philip Martin.
